scripts.e2e-docker: docker run --rm --add-host=host.docker.internal:host-gateway --volume $(pwd):/e2e --workdir /e2e --env='CYPRESS_HOST=host.docker.internal' --env='CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3000' --entrypoint '/bin/bash' cypress/included:9.5.1-node16.14.0-slim-chrome99-ff97 -c './node_modules/.bin/cypress install && yarn grafana-e2e run'
scripts.e2e-docker:update: docker run --rm --add-host=host.docker.internal:host-gateway --volume $(pwd):/e2e --workdir /e2e --env='CYPRESS_HOST=host.docker.internal' --env='CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3000' --entrypoint '/bin/bash' cypress/included:9.5.1-node16.14.0-slim-chrome99-ff97 -c './node_modules/.bin/cypress install && yarn grafana-e2e run --update-screenshots'
